awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Humberto Fuentes is a wealthy doctor whose wife has recently died. In spite of the advice of his children, he takes a trip to visit his former students who now work in impoverished villages. His trip soon becomes a quest, politically awakening him when he finds out that one of his students was killed by the army.

title: Men with Guns
